scripts.web: yarn set-env:dev && PORT=3000 PUBLIC_URL=http://localhost:8080/counterterminal SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true yarn using-web-local craco start
scripts.web-windows: yarn set-env:dev && set PORT=3000 PUBLIC_URL=http://localhost:8080/counterterminal SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true yarn using-web-local craco start
scripts.web-test1: yarn set-env:test1 && PORT=3000 PUBLIC_URL=http://localhost:8080/counterterminal SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true yarn using-web-local craco start
